newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: BPI sees combined profits of about 4.0 bln pesos.
newsitem.headline: BPI sees combined profits of about 4.0 bln pesos.

text.p: Bank of the Philippine Islands expects combined profits to reach about 4.0 billion pesos this year following its merger with CityTrust Banking Corp, a BPI official said on Wednesday.
"We expect close to 4.0 billion pesos with CityTrust," the official said.
The merger of the two banks took effect on Monday.
For BPI alone,"we're targetted to hit 3.0 billion pesos for the total," the official said. Last year, BPI made net profits of 1.9 billion pesos.
As of the first eight months of this year, BPI's net profit reached about 2.2 billion pesos, 70 percent higher than last year, the official, who declined to be named, said.
He traced BPI's strong earnings mainly from interest income on the back of a robust loan portfolio.
A stock rights offer of about 5.0 billion pesos last year gave the bank more ammunition to boost its loan portfolio, the official said.
